channel.title: How to fix USA
channel.description:
How to fix the USA:
Automatic death sentences for rapists, and murderers.
Life sentences for violent criminals,
Life means life.
No more cushy prisons, a cell, a bed, a toilet, a court for exercise and a library for the mind, no holidays, no TV's and no pool tables.
No shortening of sentences, good behavior only means that you will get out on time.
Lowering the age of adult punishments to 15. If they can commit adult crimes, they can pay for them like adults.
The ability to defend ones home in any way they see fit including lethal force if necessary.
Secure the borders 100%.
Spend more money on the military to help Israel.
Spend more money on police.
Increase education expectation levels.
No more "Robin Hood" economy like Obama's dream. More "market"-based economy. Robin Hood economy is flat out stupid.
Ban all drugs. Caught using drugs = 2 years, caught again = 10 years, selling drugs = 20 years+
They would be my initial ideas but I have many more regarding reforming the education system to stamp out the culture of disrespect for authority in schools such as bringing back teacher > student physical punishment (hitting student's hand with ruler for misbehavior, large fines for fighting/bullying)

Canownueazy:

No more cushy prisons, a cell, a bed, a toilet, a court for exercise and a library for the mind, no holidays, no TV’s and no pool tables

No shortening of sentences, good behavior only means that you will get out on time.

Agreed, most stay in prison 1/3 of their sentence time.

Canownueazy:

Lowering the age of adult punishments to 15. If they can commit adult crimes, they can pay for them like adults.

I believe if you’re 14+ and you commit a federal crime you will be tried as an adult.

Canownueazy:

The ability to defend ones home in any way they see fit including lethal force if necessary.

Castle Laws already exist, google it.

Canownueazy:

Secure the borders 100%.

Impossible, just make it harder for illegals to live here and exploit the system.

Canownueazy:

Spend more money on the military to help Israel.

Military spending shouldn’t be increased or decreased, its our last solid budget. And only help Israel if we don’t influence any neighboring countries.

Canownueazy:

Spend more money on police.

And firefighters etc, its a shame all of the money is being wasted on bullshit instead.

Canownueazy:

Increase education expectation levels.

Yes, force the failures to retake grades early on to stress importance of education.

Canownueazy:

No more “Robin Hood” economy like Obama’s dream. More “market”-based economy. Robin Hood economy is flat out stupid.

Semi true, but don’t make the middle class or rich pay for the poor, use taxes to implement systems like G.E.D. to help the poor help themselves. cut taxes for the rich when market begins to fall, once its at a stable state remove the cuts to the rich and evenly spread the work among the middle class and rich too pull out.

Canownueazy:

Ban all drugs. Caught using drugs = 2 years, caught again = 10 years, selling drugs = 20 years+

Impossible, but public schools should conduct drug tests every 3 months, same for welfare and unemployment recipients.

krackkid:

tl;dr But you can’t fix the USA…

Don’t fall victim to the majority.
